1035.name: Emberknife
1035.description:
• Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them over time.
  • Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Challenging Smite and increases its damage to monsters. Challenging Smite marks champions. During this time, you deal bonus true damage to them on hit and take reduced damage from them.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen mana when in the Jungle or River.Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

1039.name: Hailblade
1039.description:
• Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them over time.
  • Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Chilling Smite and increases its damage to monsters. When smiting champions Chilling Smite deals true damage and steals their Move Speed.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen mana when in the Jungle or River.Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1040.name: Obsidian Edge
1040.description:
• Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them over time.
  • Auto Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Attack-Smite, increasing its damage to monsters.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen mana when in the Jungle or River.Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1054.name: Doran's Shield
1054.description:
• Focus: Attacks deal additional damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores Health over time.
  • Endure: Restores Health after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

1055.name: Doran's Blade
1055.description: • Warmonger: Gain Omnivamp.Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

1056.name: Doran's Ring
1056.description:
• Focus: Attacks deal additional damage to minions.
  • Drain: Restore Mana every second. Damaging an enemy champion increases this amount. If you can't gain Mana, regenerate Health instead.

1082.name: Dark Seal
1082.description:
• Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stack for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 5 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 4 Ability Power per stack of Glory .Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer .

1083.name: Cull
1083.description:
• Attacks restore Health per hit.
  • Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap .

1101.name: Scorchclaw Pup
1101.description:
• Jungle Companions: Summon an Scorchclaw to assist you in the jungle.
  • Scorchclaw's Slash: When fully grown your companion periodically imbues your next damaging effect to Slow and damage enemy champions.

1102.name: Gustwalker Hatchling
1102.description:
• Jungle Companions: Summon a Gustwalker to assist you while in the jungle.
  • Gustwalker's Gait: When fully grown your companion grants Move Speed after entering brush or killing monsters.

1103.name: Mosstomper Seedling
1103.description:
• Jungle Companions: Summon a Mosstomper to assist you while in the jungle.
  • Mosstomper's Courage: When fully grown your companion grants a permanent shield that regenerates either after killing monsters or out of combat. While the shield holds gain 20% Tenacity and Slow Resist.

1104.name: Eye of the Herald
1104.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Crush the Eye of the Herald, summoning Rift Herald. The Herald will proceed down the nearest lane and deal massive damage to any turrets in the way.<Passive>Glimpse of the Void: </Passive>Grants Empowered.</MainText>

1502.name: Reinforced Armor
1502.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats>UNIQUE Passive - Reinforced Armor: Reduces incoming damage by 0% and becomes immune to True Damage when no enemy minions are nearby.</MainText>

1506.name: Reinforced Armor
1506.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats>UNIQUE Passive - Base Turret Reinforced Armor: Reduces incoming damage by 0% and becomes immune to True Damage when no enemy minions are nearby. Base turrets have health regeneration, but cannot regenerate past their current segment. Base turrets are segmented at 33%, 66% and 100% health.</MainText>

2003.name: Health Potion
2003.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink the potion to restore <Healing>120 Health </Healing>over 15 seconds.<Rules>You may carry up to 5 Health Potions.</Rules></MainText>

2010.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
2010.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Eat the biscuit to restore <Healing>8% missing Health </Healing>and <ScaleMana>Mana </ScaleMana>over 5 seconds. Consuming or selling a biscuit permanently grants <ScaleMana>40 maximum Mana </ScaleMana>.</MainText>

2015.name: Kircheis Shard
2015.description:
• Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Jolt: Energized Attacks gain additional magic damage.

2031.name: Refillable Potion
2031.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Consumes a charge to restore <Healing>100 Health </Healing>over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.</MainText>

2033.name: Corrupting Potion
2033.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Consumes a charge to restore <Healing>100 Health </Healing>and <ScaleMana>75 Mana </ScaleMana>over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for <MagicDamage>15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage </MagicDamage>over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.<Rules>Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.</Rules></MainText>

2051.name: Guardian's Horn
2051.description:
• Recovery: Restores Health over time.
  • Undaunted: Blocks damage from attacks and spells from champions.
  • Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

2052.name: Poro-Snax
2052.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Serves a scrumptious scoop to a nearby Poro, causing it to grow in size.<FlavorText>This savory blend of free-range, grass-fed Avarosan game hens and organic, non-ZMO Freljordian herbs contains the essential nutrients necessary to keep your Poro purring with pleasure.All proceeds will be donated towards fighting Noxian animal cruelty.</FlavorText></MainText>

2055.name: Control Ward
2055.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>traps, reveal <KeywordStealth>Camouflaged </KeywordStealth>enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.<Rules>You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.</Rules></MainText>

2065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
2065.description:
Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies Move Speed.
  • Motivate: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

2138.name: Elixir of Iron
2138.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink to gain 300 Health, 25% Tenacity, and increased champion size for 3 minutes. While Active, moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champions' Move Speed by 15%.<Rules>Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.</Rules></MainText>

2139.name: Elixir of Sorcery
2139.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink to gain 50 Ability Power and <ScaleMana>15% Mana Regen </ScaleMana>for 3 minutes. While Active, damaging a champion or turret deals <TrueDamage>25 bonus true damage </TrueDamage>(5s cooldown).<Rules>Champion level <Attention>9</Attention>or greater required to purchase. Elixir of Sorcery's true damage effect has no cooldown when attacking turrets. Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.</Rules></MainText>

2140.name: Elixir of Wrath
2140.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Drink to gain 30 Attack Damage and 12% Physical Vamp (against champions) for 3 minutes.<Rules>Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.</Rules></MainText>

2419.name: Commencing Stopwatch
2419.description: • Transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Takedowns reduce this timer by 2 minutes. That Stopwatch contributes 250 gold to the items it builds into.Stopwatch normally contributes 750 gold

2420.name: Stopwatch
2420.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Stasis: </Active>Use one time only to become <Status>Invulnerable </Status>and <Status>Untargetable </Status>for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a <RarityGeneric>Broken Stopwatch </RarityGeneric>).</MainText>

2421.name: Broken Stopwatch
2421.description: • Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

2422.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
2422.description: • Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

2423.name: Perfectly Timed Stopwatch
2423.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Stasis: </Active>Use one time only to become <Status>Invulnerable </Status>and <Status>Untargetable </Status>for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a <RarityGeneric>Broken Stopwatch </RarityGeneric>).</MainText>

2424.name: Broken Stopwatch
2424.description: • Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

3001.name: Evenshroud
3001.description: • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized , cause that target and all nearby enemy Champions to take increased damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist

3003.name: Archangel's Staff
3003.description:
• Awe: Gain Ability Haste equal to bonus Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Seraph's Embrace .Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3004.name: Manamune
3004.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to your max Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability or Attack to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Muramana .Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3009.name: Boots of Swiftness
3009.description: • The strength of movement slowing effects is reduced by 25%.

3011.name: Chemtech Putrifier
3011.description: • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding another ally will enhance both of you, causing the next damage to enemy champions to apply 40% Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3026.name: Guardian Angel
3026.description: • Saving Grace: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base Health and 30% max Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300s cooldown).

3031.name: Infinity Edge
3031.description: • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain35% Critical Strike Damage.

3033.name: Mortal Reminder
3033.description: • Sepsis: Dealing physical damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. Consecutive attacks to that enemy enhances this effect to 40% Grievous Wounds against them until the effect is allowed to elapse.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3036.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
3036.description: • Giant Slayer: Deal bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

3040.name: Seraph's Embrace
3040.description:
• Awe: Gain Ability Haste based on Mana.
  • Empyrean: Restore Health based on Mana spent. Toggle abilities can heal up to the same value per second.

3041.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
3041.description:
• Glory: Gain 4 stacks for a champion kill or 2 stacks for an assist (up to 25 stacks total). Lose 10 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory . Gain 10% Move Speed if you have at least 10 stacks.Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Dark Seal .

3042.name: Muramana
3042.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage based on Mana.
  • Shock: Attacks against champions deal additional physical damage.

3044.name: Phage
3044.description: • Sturdy: After you deal physical damage to a champion, restore Health over time.Restoration reduced for Ranged users.

3046.name: Phantom Dancer
3046.description: • Spectral Waltz: Attacks grant Ghosting and stacking increased Move Speed. In addition, Attacking 4 times causes Spectral Waltz to also grant Attack Speed.Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

3050.name: Zeke's Convergence
3050.description:
Active - Conduit: Designate an Accomplice .
  • Convergence: After you Immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's Attacks and Ability hits apply additional damage to that enemy.Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.

3053.name: Sterak's Gage
3053.description:
• The Claws that Catch: Gain base AD as bonus Attack Damage.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a Shield, decaying over time.

3057.name: Sheen
3057.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage.

3065.name: Spirit Visage
3065.description: • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you.

3068.name: Sunfire Aegis
3068.description: • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1.75% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).

3070.name: Tear of the Goddess
3070.description:
• Focus: Attacks deal additional physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana.Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3071.name: Black Cleaver
3071.description:
• Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of Armor reduction.
  • Rage: Dealing physical damage to a champion grants Move Speed per stack of Carve on them.

3072.name: Bloodthirster
3072.description: • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage.

3074.name: Ravenous Hydra
3074.description:
• Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal physical damage to other nearby enemies.
  • Carnivorous: Gain AD and Omnivamp whenever you kill a minion and 2 times that amount when you kill a Champion, Large Monster, or Siege Minion. Lose 50% of your stacks on death.

3075.name: Thornmail
3075.description: • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal damage to the attacker and apply 25%Grievous Wounds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 40%Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3076.name: Bramble Vest
3076.description: • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal damage to the attacker and apply 25% Grievous Wounds if they are a champion.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3077.name: Tiamat
3077.description: • Cleave: Attacks deal physical damage to other nearby enemies. Cleave does not trigger on structures.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

3078.name: Trinity Force
3078.description:
• Threefold Strike: Attacks grant Move Speed. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage, stacking.
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage, Ability Haste, and Move Speed.

3083.name: Warmog's Armor
3083.description: • Warmog's Heart: If you have at least 1100 bonus Health, restore max Health per second if damage hasn't been taken within 6 seconds.

3084.name: Heartsteel
3084.description: • Colossal Consumption: Charge up a powerful attack against a champion over 3s while within 700 range of them. The charged attack deals 125 + 6% of your max Health as bonus physical damage, and grants you 10% of that amount as permanent max Health. (30s) cooldown per target.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1%Increased Health &6%Champion Size.

3085.name: Runaan's Hurricane
3085.description: • Wind's Fury: When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target. Bolts apply On-Hit effects and can Critically Strike.Item is for Ranged champions only.

3089.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
3089.description: • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

3091.name: Wit's End
3091.description: • Fray: Attacks apply magic damage On-Hit and grant Move Speed.

3094.name: Rapid Firecannon
3094.description:
• Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies bonus damage. In addition, Energized attacks gain Attack Range.Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

3095.name: Stormrazor
3095.description:
• Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
  • Paralyze: Your Energized Attack gains bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized Attacks slow enemies.

3100.name: Lich Bane
3100.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional magic damage.

3102.name: Banshee's Veil
3102.description: • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability.Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.

3107.name: Redemption
3107.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Intervention: </Active>Target an area within. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to restore Health to allies and damage enemy champions.<Rules>Item can be activated whilst dead. Damage and Healing reduced by 50% if the target has recently been affected by another <Active>Intervention </Active>. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.</Rules></MainText>

3109.name: Knight's Vow
3109.description:
Active - Pledge: Designate an ally who is Worthy ..
  • Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect damage they take to you and heal based on the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to Champions.

3110.name: Frozen Heart
3110.description:
• Winter's Caress: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks.

3111.name: Mercury's Treads
3111.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Rules>Tenacity reduces the duration of <Status>Stun </Status>, <Status>Slow </Status>, <Status>Taunt </Status>, <Status>Fear </Status>, <Status>Silence </Status>, <Status>Blind </Status>, <Status>Polymorph </Status>and <Status>Immobilizing </Status>effects. It has no effect on <Status>Airborne </Status>or <Status>Suppression </Status>.</Rules></MainText>

3112.name: Guardian's Orb
3112.description:
• Recovery: Restores Mana over time. If you can't gain mana, restores Health instead.
  • Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

3117.name: Mobility Boots
3117.description:
25Move Speed
  • When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115.

3119.name: Winter's Approach
3119.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Health equal to Total Mana.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability or Attack to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana , doubled if the target is a champion. Grants a maximum of 360 Mana at which point this item transforms into Fimbulwinter .Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

3121.name: Fimbulwinter
3121.description:
• Awe: Gain bonus Health based on Mana.
  • Everlasting: Immobilizing or Slowing an enemy champion consumes current Mana and grants a Shield. The Shield is increased if more than one enemy is nearby.

3123.name: Executioner's Calling
3123.description: • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3124.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
3124.description:
• Wrath: Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 40On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.
  • Seething Strike: Every third Attack applies your On-Hit effects twice.Wrath cannot benefit from more than 100% Critical Strike Chance.Wrath's On-Hit damage conversion is affected by Critical Strike damage modifiers.

3139.name: Mercurial Scimitar
3139.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Quicksilver: </Active>Remove all crowd control debuffs and gain Move Speed.</MainText>

3142.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
3142.description:
Active - Wraith Step: Gain Move Speed and Ghosting.
  • Haunt: Gain Move Speed out of combat.Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

3143.name: Randuin's Omen
3143.description:
Active - Humility: Slow nearby enemies.
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks.
  • Critical Resilience: Critical Strikes deal 20% less damage to you.

3152.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
3152.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supersonic: </Active>Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal damage. Then, gain Move Speed towards enemy champions.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Magic Penetration.</MainText>

3153.name: Blade of The Ruined King
3153.description:
• Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage based off of the target's current Health.
  • Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals magic damage and steals Move Speed.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

3155.name: Hexdrinker
3155.description: • Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain a magic damage Shield.

3156.name: Maw of Malmortius
3156.description: • Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain a magic damage Shield. When Lifeline triggers, gain Omnivamp until the end of combat.

3157.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
3157.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Stasis: </Active>You become <Status>Invulnerable </Status>and <Status>Untargetable </Status>for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time.</MainText>

3158.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
3158.description: • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

3161.name: Spear Of Shojin
3161.description:
• Dragonforce: Your Non-Ultimate spells gain (8 (+0.08 per 100 Bonus AD) | 6 (+0.06 per 100 Bonus AD)) Ability Haste, reduced to (4 (+0.04 per 100 Bonus AD) | 3 (+0.03 per 100 Bonus AD))) Ability Haste for Immobilizing spells.
  • Exigency: Gain up to (0.15 | 0.1) increased move speed, based on your missing health (Maxed when below 33% Health).Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

3165.name: Morellonomicon
3165.description: • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 40% Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

3179.name: Umbral Glaive
3179.description: • Blackout: When spotted by an enemy Ward, reveal traps and disable Wards around you. Your Attacks instantly kill revealed traps and do triple damage to Wards.

3181.name: Hullbreaker
3181.description: • Boarding Party: While no allied champions are nearby you gain Armor and Magic Resist and Attacks deal increased damage to towers. Nearby large minions gain Armor and Magic Resist and increased damage to towers.Boarding Party's resistances decay over 3 seconds when an ally gets too close.

3190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
3190.description:
Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a Shield, decaying over time.
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions Armor and Magic Resist.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist increase to Consecrate .

3193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
3193.description:
Active - Unbreakable: Gain a Shield that decays and grow in size.
  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of bonus Armor and bonus Magic Resist.Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

3211.name: Spectre's Cowl
3211.description: • Incorporeal: After taking damage from a champion, Regenerate Health.

3222.name: Mikael's Blessing
3222.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Purify: </Active>Restore Health and Remove all crowd control debuffs (except <Status>Knockups </Status>and <Status>Suppression </Status>) from an ally champion.</MainText>

3330.name: Scarecrow Effigy
3330.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Places an effigy that appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores up to a maximum of 2 charges.Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.</MainText>

3340.name: Stealth Ward
3340.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards.</MainText>

3363.name: Farsight Alteration
3363.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away.</MainText>

3364.name: Oracle Lens
3364.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Trinket: </Active>Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards.</MainText>

3400.name: Your Cut
3400.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Gain 0 gold.<Rules>Bonus gold given to an ally when Pyke executes an enemy champion using his Ultimate Ability. If no ally was involved in the kill, Pyke gets to keep the Cut!</Rules></MainText>

3504.name: Ardent Censer
3504.description: • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding another ally enhances you both, granting Attack Speed and magic damage On-Hit.

3508.name: Essence Reaver
3508.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals additional damage and restores Mana.

3513.name: Eye of the Herald
3513.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Crush the Eye of the Herald, summoning Rift Herald. The Herald will proceed down the nearest lane and deal massive damage to any turrets in the way.<Passive>Glimpse of the Void: </Passive>Grants Empowered.</MainText>

3599.name: Kalista's Black Spear
3599.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.</MainText>

3600.name: Kalista's Black Spear
3600.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Consume: </Active>Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.<Rules>Required to use <Attention>Kalista's </Attention>Ultimate Ability.</Rules></MainText>

3742.name: Dead Man's Plate
3742.description: • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target.''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

3748.name: Titanic Hydra
3748.description:
• Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage based off of bonus Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply additional damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals damage to enemies behind the target.

3802.name: Lost Chapter
3802.description: • Enlighten: Upon levelling up, restores 20% max Mana over 3 seconds.

3803.name: Catalyst of Aeons
3803.description: • Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 8% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 20% of Mana spent, up to 15 Health per cast, per second.

3814.name: Edge of Night
3814.description: • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability.Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

3850.name: Spellthief's Edge
3850.description:
• Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
  • Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Frostfang , gaining Active - Warding .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3851.name: Frostfang
3851.description:
Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Shard of True Ice .

3853.name: Shard of True Ice
3853.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.<Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.</MainText>

3854.name: Steel Shoulderguards
3854.description:
• Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below (50% for Melee Users | 30% for Ranged Users) of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).
  • Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Runesteel Spaulders , gaining Active - Warding .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3855.name: Runesteel Spaulders
3855.description:
Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below 50% of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Bulwark of the Mountain .

3857.name: Pauldrons of Whiterock
3857.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.<Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.</MainText>

3858.name: Relic Shield
3858.description:
• Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below (50% for Melee Users | 30% for Ranged Users) of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).
  • Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Targon's Buckler , gaining Active - Warding .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3859.name: Targon's Buckler
3859.description:
Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below 50% of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Bulwark of the Mountain .

3860.name: Bulwark of the Mountain
3860.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.<Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.</MainText>

3862.name: Spectral Sickle
3862.description:
• Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
  • Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Harrowing Crescent , gaining Active - Warding .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3863.name: Harrowing Crescent
3863.description:
Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
  • Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
  • Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Black Mist Scythe .This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3864.name: Black Mist Scythe
3864.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.<Active>Active - Ward: </Active>Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is <KeywordStealth>Invisible </KeywordStealth>to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.</MainText>

3916.name: Oblivion Orb
3916.description: • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 25% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

4005.name: Imperial Mandate
4005.description: • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal bonus damage and mark them. Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing additional damage and granting you both Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Power.

4401.name: Force of Nature
4401.description:
• Absorb: Taking magic damage from enemy Champions grants a stack of Steadfast . Enemy Immobilizing effects grant additional stacks.
  • Dissipate: While at max stacks of Steadfast , take reduced magic damage and gain increased Move Speed.

4628.name: Horizon Focus
4628.description: • Hypershot: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Slowing or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you.The Ability that triggers Hypershot also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect. Distance is measured from the Ability cast position.

4629.name: Cosmic Drive
4629.description: • Spelldance: Damaging a champion with 3 separate Attacks or Spells grants Move Speed and Ability Power until exiting champion combat.

4633.name: Riftmaker
4633.description: • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal bonus damage. At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Omnivamp and Ability Power.

4636.name: Night Harvester
4636.description: • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals additional magic damage and grants you Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

4637.name: Demonic Embrace
4637.description:
• Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for max Health magic damage every second.
  • Dark Pact: Gain bonus Health as Ability Power.

4638.name: Watchful Wardstone
4638.description: • Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.After completing the Support Quest and reaching Level 13, transforms into Vigilant Wardstone .

4641.name: Stirring Wardstone
4641.description:
• Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Blooming Empire: This item transforms into Watchful Wardstone once 15 Stealth Wards have been placed.Stealth Wards are placed from the Stealth Ward Trinket and the upgraded Unique: Support items.

4643.name: Vigilant Wardstone
4643.description:
• Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Behold: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.
  • Blessing of Ixtal: Grants a 12% increase to bonus Health, bonus Attack Damage, Ability Haste, and Ability Power.Upgrades from Watchful Sightstone .

4644.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
4644.description:
• Divine Safeguard: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage. Safeguard persists for 1.5 seconds after taking champion damage.
  • Holy Gift: While Safeguarded and for 3 seconds after it is broken, gain Ability Power.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed and Ability Power.

4645.name: Shadowflame
4645.description: • Cinderbloom: Damage to champions benefits from additional Magic Penetration based on their current Health. If the target was recently affected by Shields, gain the maximum benefit against that target.

6035.name: Silvermere Dawn
6035.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Quicksilver: </Active>Remove all crowd control debuffs and gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance.</MainText>

6333.name: Death's Dance
6333.description:
• Ignore Pain: Damage taken is dealt to you over time instead.
  • Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool and restore Health over time.

6609.name: Chempunk Chainsword
6609.description: • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 25%Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 40%Grievous Wounds .Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

6616.name: Staff of Flowing Water
6616.description: • Rapids: Healing or Shielding another ally grants you both Ability Power and Ability Haste.

6617.name: Moonstone Renewer
6617.description: • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore Health to the most wounded nearby ally. Each second spent in combat with champions increases your Heal and Shield Power.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items an increase to Starlit Grace's Heal.

6630.name: Goredrinker
6630.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Thirsting Slash: </Active>Deal damage to nearby enemies. Restore Health for each champion hit.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Ability Haste.</MainText>

6631.name: Stridebreaker
6631.description:
Active - Halting Slash: Deal damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them. Can be cast while moving.
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed.

6632.name: Divine Sunderer
6632.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage On-Hit. If the target is a champion, also heal.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Magic Penetration.

6653.name: Liandry's Anguish
6653.description:
• Agony: Deal bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health.
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn over time.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

6655.name: Luden's Tempest
6655.description: • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you Move Speed. Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Magic Penetration.

6656.name: Everfrost
6656.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Glaciate: </Active>Deal damage in a cone, <Status>Slowing </Status>enemies hit. Enemies at the center of the cone are <Status>Rooted </Status>instead.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Ability Power.</MainText>

6657.name: Rod of Ages
6657.description:
This item gains 20 Health, 20 Mana and 4 Ability Power every 60 seconds up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 Health, 200 mana, and 40 Ability Power. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level and all effects of Eternity are increased by 50%.
  • Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 8% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 20% of Mana spent, up to 15 Health per cast, per second. For every 250 Health or Mana restored this way, gain 25% Decaying Move Speed for 2 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

6660.name: Bami's Cinder
6660.description: • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased against minions and monsters).

6662.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
6662.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage and creates a frost field for 2.5s. Enemies that move across the field are Slowed . Your primary target is crippled, applying a 100% stronger slow on them and reducing their damage by 10% against you for 2.5s. (1.5s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 50 Health , 5%Tenacity, and 5%Slow Resist.

6664.name: Turbo Chemtank
6664.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supercharged: </Active>Grants Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that <Status>Slows </Status>nearby champions.</MainText>

6665.name: Jak'Sho, The Protean
6665.description: • Voidborn Resilience: For each second in champion combat gain a stack granting 2 Armor and Magic Resist, up to 8 stacks max. At max stacks become empowered, instantly draining enemies around you for 3% of your max health as magic damage and Healing you for the same amount (reduced to 1% against minions and monsters). Your resists are increased by 10% until end of combat.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Armor and Magic Resist .

6667.name: Radiant Virtue
6667.description: • Guiding Light: Upon casting your Ultimate you Transcend, increasing your Max Health by 10% for 9s. While Transcended you and allies within 1200 range of you gain 15 non-ultimate ability haste and heal for 1% of your max health every 3 seconds, increased by up to 100% based on that champion's missing health (60s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100Health.

6670.name: Noonquiver
6670.description: • Precision: Attacks deal additional damage to Minions and Monsters.

6671.name: Galeforce
6671.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Cloudburst: </Active>Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination. Deals damage, increased against low Health targets.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Move Speed.</MainText>

6672.name: Kraken Slayer
6672.description: • Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals additional true damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Speed.

6673.name: Immortal Shieldbow
6673.description: • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a Shield. In addition, gain Attack Damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage and Health.

6675.name: Navori Quickblades
6675.description:
• Transcendence: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, your Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by 15% of their remaining cooldown.
  • Impermanence Your abilities deal up to 0 increased damage based on Critical Strike Chance.

6676.name: The Collector
6676.description: • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

6677.name: Rageknife
6677.description: • Wrath: Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 35On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.

6691.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
6691.description: • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals additional damage. If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible .Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste and Move Speed.

6692.name: Eclipse
6692.description: • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals additional damage, grants you Move Speed and a Shield.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Move Speed.

6693.name: Prowler's Claw
6693.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Sandswipe: </Active>Dash through target enemy champion, dealing damage. You deal increased damage to the target.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Lethality and Move Speed.</MainText>

6695.name: Serpent's Fang
6695.description: • Shield Reaver: Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, reduce all shields on them.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

6696.name: Axiom Arc
6696.description: • Flux: Whenever a Champion dies within 3 seconds of you having damaged them, refund 20% of your Ultimate Ability's total cooldown.

7000.name: Sandshrike's Claw
7000.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Sandswipe: </Active>Dash through target enemy champion, dealing damage. You deal increased damage to the target.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Lethality and Move Speed.</MainText>

7001.name: Syzygy
7001.description: • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals additional damage, grants you Move Speed and a Shield.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Move Speed.

7002.name: Draktharr's Shadowcarver
7002.description: • Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals additional damage. If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible .Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste and Move Speed.

7005.name: Frozen Fist
7005.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage and creates a frost field for 2.5s. Enemies that move across the field are Slowed . Your primary target is crippled, applying a 100% stronger slow on them and reducing their damage by 10% against you for 2.5s. (1.5s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 50 Health , 5%Tenacity, and 5%Slow Resist.

7006.name: Typhoon
7006.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Cloudburst: </Active>Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination. Deals damage, increased against low Health targets.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Move Speed.</MainText>

7007.name: Wyrmfallen Sacrifice
7007.description: • Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals additional true damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Speed.

7008.name: Bloodward
7008.description: • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a Shield. In addition, gain Attack Damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage and Health.

7009.name: Icathia's Curse
7009.description: • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal bonus damage. At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Omnivamp and Ability Power.

7010.name: Vespertide
7010.description: • Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals additional magic damage and grants you Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

7011.name: Upgraded Aeropack
7011.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supersonic: </Active>Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal damage. Then, gain Move Speed towards enemy champions.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Magic Penetration.</MainText>

7012.name: Liandry's Lament
7012.description:
• Agony: Deal bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health.
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn over time.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

7013.name: Eye of Luden
7013.description: • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you Move Speed. Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Magic Penetration.

7014.name: Eternal Winter
7014.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Glaciate: </Active>Deal damage in a cone, <Status>Slowing </Status>enemies hit. Enemies at the center of the cone are <Status>Rooted </Status>instead.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Ability Power.</MainText>

7015.name: Ceaseless Hunger
7015.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Thirsting Slash: </Active>Deal damage to nearby enemies. Restore Health for each champion hit.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Ability Haste.</MainText>

7016.name: Dreamshatter
7016.description:
Active - Halting Slash: Deal damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them. Can be cast while moving.
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed.

7017.name: Deicide
7017.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage On-Hit. If the target is a champion, also heal.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Magic Penetration.

7018.name: Infinity Force
7018.description:
• Threefold Strike: Attacks grant Move Speed. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage, stacking.
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage, Ability Haste, and Move Speed.

7019.name: Reliquary of the Golden Dawn
7019.description:
Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a Shield, decaying over time.
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions Armor and Magic Resist.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist increase to Consecrate .

7020.name: Shurelya's Requiem
7020.description:
Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies Move Speed.
  • Motivate: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

7021.name: Starcaster
7021.description: • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore Health to the most wounded nearby ally. Each second spent in combat with champions increases your Heal and Shield Power.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items an increase to Starlit Grace's Heal.

7022.name: Seat of Command
7022.description: • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal bonus damage and mark them. Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing additional damage and granting you both Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Power.

7023.name: Equinox
7023.description: • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized , cause that target and all nearby enemy Champions to take increased damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist

7024.name: Caesura
7024.description:
• Divine Safeguard: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage. Safeguard persists for 1.5 seconds after taking champion damage.
  • Holy Gift: While Safeguarded and for 3 seconds after it is broken, gain Ability Power.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed and Ability Power.

7025.name: Leviathan
7025.description: • Colossal Consumption: Charge up a powerful attack against a champion over 3s while within 700 range of them. The charged attack deals 125 + 6% of your max Health as bonus physical damage, and grants you 10% of that amount as permanent max Health. (30s) cooldown per target.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1%Increased Health &6%Champion Size.

7026.name: The Unspoken Parasite
7026.description: • Voidborn Resilience: For each second in champion combat gain a stack granting 2 Armor and Magic Resist, up to 8 stacks max. At max stacks become empowered, instantly draining enemies around you for 3% of your max health as magic damage and Healing you for the same amount (reduced to 1% against minions and monsters). Your resists are increased by 10% until end of combat.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Armor and Magic Resist .

7027.name: Primordial Dawn
7027.description: • Guiding Light: Upon casting your Ultimate you Transcend, increasing your Max Health by 10% for 9s. While Transcended you and allies within 1200 range of you gain 15 non-ultimate ability haste and heal for 1% of your max health every 3 seconds, increased by up to 100% based on that champion's missing health (60s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100Health.

7028.name: Infinite Convergence
7028.description:
This item gains 20 Health, 20 Mana and 4 Ability Power every 60 seconds up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 Health, 200 mana, and 40 Ability Power. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level and all effects of Eternity are increased by 50%.
  • Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 8% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 20% of Mana spent, up to 15 Health per cast, per second. For every 250 Health or Mana restored this way, gain 25% Decaying Move Speed for 2 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

8001.name: Anathema's Chains
8001.description:
Active - Vow: Choose a Nemesis to start building a Vendetta (90s).
  • Vendetta: Take reduced damage from your Nemesis, increasing per Vendetta stack. You gain stacks over time, and reach the maximum number of stacks after 60 seconds.
  • Vengeance: At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has reduced Tenacity while near you.Active can be cast while dead and at global range. Stacks reset upon choosing a new target. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in-combat with champions."She swore to dedicate her life to his destruction. The gauntlets heard."

8020.name: Abyssal Mask
8020.description:
• Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 8% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 20% of Mana spent, up to 15 Health per cast, per second.
  • Unmake: Curse nearby enemy champions, reducing their Magic Resist. For each Cursed enemy, gain Magic Resist.
